introduction: Once upon a time, in a #region#, there was a #person# who longed for #desire#.
adventure: One day, they set off on a #journey# across the #body_of_water# to find a legendary #artifact#.
Their #travel# led them through #vegetation#, over #slope#, and into the depths of a #natural_object#.
They met a #communicator# who shared a #message# about a hidden #treasure#.
conclusion: After many #happening#, they finally reached their #destination# and discovered the #artifact#.
But their #conflict# with a #unpleasant_person# almost cost them everything!
In the end, they returned home, forever changed by their #experience#.
